ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He warned them of Our onslaught but they dismissed the warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He had warned them of Our might, but they passed over the warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely Lot warned his people that We shall seize them (with Our chastisement), but they doubted the warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Lot warned them against Our torment, but they persistently disputed it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed he had warned them of Our seizure – in response they doubted the warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And he indeed had warned them of Our punishment, but they doubted the warnings!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly he warned them of Our violent seizure, but they obstinately disputed the warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He had warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And he indeed had warned them of Our blow, but they did doubt the warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Lot warned them of Our punishment, but they disputed the warnings --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly he had warned them of Our grasp, but: they doubted the warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He had already warned them of Our punishment, but they disputed the warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And (Lut) did warn them of Our Punishment, but they disputed about the Warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And he [Lout (Lot)] indeed had warned them of Our Grasp, but they did doubt the warnings!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He had warned them of Our assault but they disputed the warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He had warned them of Our onslaught, but they dismissed the warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And he had already warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [54:36] And verily he had warned them, Lot had threatened them, of Our strike, Our seizing them with chastisement, but they disputed, they contested and denied, the warnings, his warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And he) Lot (indeed had warned them of Our blow) of Our chastisement, (but they did doubt the warnings) but they rejected what Lot said to them.
